entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 12:20 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: E 20 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then southeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Fog patches. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
